text: President Trump posed with Robert Kraft and Bill Belichick during the Patriots ’ visit to the White House in 2017. President Trump wasn ’ t happy when Tom Brady said he would not visit the White House with the Super Bowl champion New England Patriots last year, citing family obligations. That ’ s according to a new Washington Post report on the furor surrounding the Philadelphia Eagles ’ canceled visit. Trump was furious when he found out Brady would not accompany his teammates to the White House last year, according to the Post, and made a call to team owner Robert Kraft.
